TopicTitle: That.. That doesn't look too comfortable

Articles.Content:
Following an incident where the top half of my rocket was sheared off during ascent, I checked in on the surviving(temporarily) crew as they plummeted back down:

It appears my science module and 4-crew habitation pod merged.

There are some mysterious forces at work here.

Edited April 28, 2015 by A Fat Pokemon

Looks like space-time is warping, reminds me of Interstellar!

Are you sure you're not going through any wormholes in this picture?
KIA screen wow that's how you know something is broken. can you send a pic of the ship itself? BTW it happens when you clip stuff together i have it with my dragon on 0.90
Oh this bug, I remember it from a long time ago.... typically happens on high speed impacts.... Its a rare anomoly bug that usually can't be replicated....
